thread.title: Here's a list of places in Central Arkansas celebrating Easter 2024
thread.title_full: Here's a list of places in Central Arkansas celebrating Easter 2024

author: Elizabeth Godinez
title: Here's a list of places in Central Arkansas celebrating Easter 2024
text: LITTLE ROCK, Ark. â€” Easter is a holiday that is celebrated by millions of people across the globe. Though the day is typically associated with colorful eggs, bunnies, and even chocolate, the holiday is meant to signify the resurrection day. The Resurrection Day typically falls on a Sunday sometime between March 22 and April 25, and it celebrates the resurrection of Jesus Christ on the third day after his crucifixion. Depending on a person's denomination and location in the world, the Easter holiday can be celebrated in different ways. However, in the United States, most people celebrate by attending services and Easter events at local churches. If you're looking for somewhere to celebrate the Easter holiday, then check out our list below: Little Rock: - Easter Bunny visits & photos at Park Plaza Mall | Various dates and times - Easter brunch at Petit & Keet | March 31 | 10:00 a.m. - 2:00 p.m. - Community-wide Easter egg hunt at Life Line Baptist Church | March 30 | 10:00 a.m. - 12:00 p.m. - Annual Easter egg hunt and pictures at Gavi Mall | March 30 | 12:00 p.m. - 5:00 p.m. - Block party and Easter egg hunt at Connect Church | March 30 | 10:00 a.m. - 2:00 p.m. - Easter Market at Chenal | March 30 | 9:00 a.m. - 3:00 p.m. - Easter Egg Search at Pinnacle Church of Christ | March 30 | 2:00 p.m. - 4:00 p.m. - Easter egg hunt at Pulaski Heights United Methodist Church | March 30 | 10:00 a.m. - Easter Market at Pettaway | March 31 | 10:00 a.m. - 3:00 p.m. North Little Rock: - Easter brunch buffet at Cypress Social | March 31 | 10:00 a.m. - 2:00 p.m. - Easter extravaganza at NLR First United Methodist Church | March 30 | 10: 00 a.m. - 12:00 p.m. Benton: - Underwater Easter egg hunt at River Center Natatorium | March 30 | 10:00 a.m. - 2:00 p.m. - Easter family event at Life Church | March 29 | 5:00 p.m. - 8:00 p.m. Bryant: - Easter egg hunt at First Baptist Church | March 30 | 11:00 a.m. - 1:00 p.m. Hot Springs: - Easter Sunday at Legacy Church | March 31 | 10:00 a.m. - Easter brunch at Sam's Pizza Pub | March 31 | 11:00 a.m. - Egg-streme Easter encounter at Rock Creek Family Church | March 30 | 2:00 p.m. - 4:00 p.m. Sherwood: - Easter egg hunt at Cornerstone Bible Fellowship | March 30 | 10:30 a.m. - 1:00 p.m.
